title:
Towards A Post-Quantum Cryptography in Blockchain I: Basic Review on
  Theoretical Cryptography and Quantum Information Theory
abstract:
Recently, the invention of quantum computers was so revolutionary that they
bring transformative challenges in a variety of fields, especially for the
traditional cryptographic blockchain, and it may become a real thread for most
of the cryptocurrencies in the market. That is, it becomes inevitable to
consider to implement a post-quantum cryptography, which is also referred to as
quantum-resistant cryptography, for attaining quantum resistance in
blockchains.
